page.title: 11THE SUPERNATURAL, HOCKLIFFE
page.content: On the main kitchen window, in the bottom left hand corner on the outside of{Hockliffe House}there are two {handprints}stretched out as if someone is trying to get in. The{prints}can only be seen in a{full moon at {midnight. }The owner has unsuccessfully attempted to remove them. She was told of their existence by an elderly servant, who had seen the{prints. One theory}of their origin is that in the days when the house was a hospice so many sick people tried to gain admittance some had to be turned away and hence the {handprints}on the window.{A second {theory}is that the church refused to bury the diseased inmates of the hospice and so they were buried in the grounds. Could it be something {supernatural} that tries to gain admittance{from beyond the grave?}
